pages.text: The modpack includes multiple biome mods like:$(br)- $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/regions-unexplored)Regions Unexplored$()$(br)- $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/biomes-o-plenty)Biomes O' Plenty$()$(br)- $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/natures-spirit)Nature's Spirit$()$(br)$(br)Each contribute to the unique environment found in Survivalist. You can find different types of terrain and features in each of them as well as new plants and $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dynamictrees)unique trees$(). Choosing a living biome is important as each biome has different temperatures and weather patterns per season.

pages.title: The Wildlife
pages.text: Mods like $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/naturalist)Naturalist$() and $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/alexs-mobs)Alex's Mobs$() add a variety of new dynamic wildlife to the game. You can find different types of animals in each biome that will $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/alexsmobsinteraction)interact$() with each other. You can kill them for food and resources or just observe their behavior for fun.
